Articles.Content:
Kragrathea, who some may remember was working on developing a mod that adds some new planets to KSP, restarted work on it a couple months ago and is nearly ready to release it for public consumption.

Announcement here: http://www.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/comments/1pxq4p/your_order_has_shipped/

Some more details here: [thread]51893[/thread]

Edited November 7, 2013 by Mr Shifty
Removing link to unlicensed download
This is going to be fun.
I wonder why his first video looks like a slideshow. And the second video cannot be watched from Germany because of copyrighted music.
That's because it is a slide show. A large dollop of screenshots set as a video.

I'm sorry, but I have to say this:

WOOOOOOOOOHOOHOOHOOOOOO!

Finally, more places to explore than stock! I've waited 5 updates for this!

...Krag, you are my new favorite forumer/redditor/whatever.

Edited November 5, 2013 by Gojira

There more things I hear about this, the more I believe that this is a ploy by secret Kerbal Officials. As interest has been waning in the Space Program, they are simply trying to find a way to entice the Kerbal population to endorse this ludicrous enterprise of finding more planets or muns. Heck, pull out your latest copy of Encyclopedia Kerbica, and show me where it says that there might be other planets out there. Nothing. You won't find anything about this, because there is nothing.

You heard it from here first folks! The Kerbal government is messing with your minds with promises of distant yet to be seen lands. I say someone failed to clean the telescope and thought it was a planet, when it was a piece of dried piece mozzarella. Yes, it was moldy, hence the change in colors and everything.

There is a logical explanation to all of this, and to believe in all this fantasy, that there is more to space than what is currently known, is a pipe dream built by tin foil hat wearing Kerbals, who've taken advantage of the Kerbnet to spread their madness.

So before you fill out your next tax form, better think about where your Krones are going!

Stop the lies!

- Concerned Hard Working Kerbal

There more things I hear about this, the more I believe that this is a ploy by secret Kerbal Officials. As interest has been waning in the Space Program, they are simply trying to find a way to entice the Kerbal population to endorse this ludicrous enterprise of finding more planets or muns. Heck, pull out your latest copy of Encyclopedia Kerbica, and show me where it says that there might be other planets out there. Nothing. You won't find anything about this, because there is nothing.

You heard it from here first folks! The Kerbal government is messing with your minds with promises of distant yet to be seen lands. I say someone failed to clean the telescope and thought it was a planet, when it was a piece of dried piece mozzarella. Yes, it was moldy, hence the change in colors and everything.

There is a logical explanation to all of this, and to believe in all this fantasy, that there is more to space than what is currently known, is a pipe dream built by tin foil hat wearing Kerbals, who've taken advantage of the Kerbnet to spread their madness.

So before you fill out your next tax form, better think about where your Krones are going!

Stop the lies!

- Concerned Hard Working Kerbal

Shut up! This is awesome!

-Ultra-Super-Excited Kerbal

Shut up! This is awesome!

-Ultra-Super-Excited Kerbal

I see that the Kerbnet minions have been made aware of my last public address.

What I can see to this 'excited' Kerbal is that his tin foil hat won't save him when the Kerbal economy goes down because we wasted all our money sending rockets to nowhere!

Kerbals need to know the truth!

- Concerned Hard Working Kerbal

I see that the Kerbnet minions have been made aware of my last public address.

What I can see to this 'excited' Kerbal is that his tin foil hat won't save him when the Kerbal economy goes down because we wasted all our money sending rockets to nowhere!

Kerbals need to know the truth!

- Concerned Hard Working Kerbal

You're just a pessimist!

- Ultra-Super-Excited Kerbal

So before you fill out your next tax form, better think about where your Krones are going!

I moved all my assets into Yellowshinyum years ago, and have amassed several metric tons of snacks in anticipation of the global economic collapse that will inevitably follow the bubble popping on this rocket fad.

- A Prepared Kerbal

(Ontopic, looking forward to new places to visit.)

AWESOME!!!

So glad to hear Krag is back at it!! The work done and shown in the old thread was amazing, and I for one was sad to see the update knock it back so far.

This has the potential to be the most game changing....and more importantly, game expanding mod to be released.

And for advanced players using mods like kethane, EPLP, and the WIP foundations....new planets would be breath of fresh air...

Already have plans for KSC3 on Duna when new planets are finaly released.

Also, please dont let jackasses like MedievalNerd get to you, most of the community is clamoring for this! =P

Edited November 5, 2013 by KhaosCorp
Shut up and take my rep points!
I'm glad the development and status was relatively quiet on the forums. That last debacle was painful to watch especially from some demanding releasing of the code before he was ever finished.

I'm glad the development and status was relatively quiet on the forums. That last debacle was painful to watch especially from some demanding releasing of the code before he was ever finished.

I wasn't around when this happened. But I'm really baffled as to how this could ever be ill received. This is pure genius this and earth rescale are some of sky rocketing to the top of my list.
And now we wait.
Set to Ludicrous Speed! This is going to be pretty awesome.

CAN I HAVE IT CAN I HAVE IT CAN I HAVE IT

Edited November 6, 2013 by LtHeckard
No reaction images please. See forum rules.
Guys, reminder, no roleplay.
Oh sweet! ITS GOING TO BE RELEASED TODAY OR TOMMOROW YEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH

Bored with Jool bored with everything Im ready for something New

Kragathea Has the Power of 100 Developers

WOW this looks awesome! really looking forward to it!

The KSP community seems to be buzzing with mod activity in recent times.

Okay it's too hard to be calm.

HOLY SNAP PLANETS.

... We will need to see if these planets have new results for the science experiments.

WE MUST MAKE THE CROWD-SOURCED SCIENCE PROJECT AWARE OF THIS.
